sesp-name:
{{notranslate}}
Name of the extension as it should be displayed.
sesp-property-author: The name of the special property that stores the contributors to a page
sesp-property-first-author:
The name of the special property that stores the user that created the page.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
sesp-property-page-id-desc:
This informatory message describes the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Special_properties special property].

* $1 holds the name of the special property.
sesp-property-page-len: The name of the special property.
sesp-property-page-len-desc:
This informatory message describes the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Special_properties special property].

* $1 holds the name of the special property.
sesp-property-view-count:
The name of the special property that stores the number of pages views.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
sesp-property-revisions:
The name of the special property that stores the number of revisions.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
sesp-property-talk-revisions:
The name of the special property that stores the number of revisions on the talk page associated to this page.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
sesp-property-mediatype:
The name of the special property that stores the media type of a file.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
sesp-property-user-registration-date:
The name of the special property that stores a users registration date on a user page.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
sesp-property-user-edit-count:
The name of the special property that stores a users edit count on a user page.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
sesp-property-exif-data:
The name of the special property that stores a reference to the EXIF data of a file.
{{Doc-smw-sp}}
